Product Name: INSHOWER TONE UP CREAM FOR BODY

Full Description:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
The formula of the mascara provides intense black colour.
It lengthens, thickens and turns up the lashes, giving them a spectacular, theatrical effect.
The specially selected brush combs them and prevents them from sticking together.
It dispenses the mascara evenly without leaving clumps.
Due to the long-lasting formula, the mascara does not crumble or smudge during the day.
Washable only with products designed for removing make-up of waterproof cosmetics.
It contains beeswax, which cares for the eyelashes.
Suitable for people with sensitive eyes and wearing contact lenses.
Tested under the supervision of a dermatologist and ophthalmologist.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
Pastel Mini Liquid Highlighter series features Moonlight, Sunlight, Skylight and Starlight colours. 
The new mini bottle enables you to take your favourite highlighter with you wherever you go.
Used to bring shine and highlight the desired parts of the face. 
Notably; Cheekbones, above or below the brow line, bridge of nose, chin, cheeks, forehead,
above the lips and décolleté area (lower neckline). 4.2ml.
Application: Can be applied with or without other makeup products to highlight desired areas of the face.
Apply highlighter to the areas where you want your face to stand out. To emphasize the cheekbones,
it should be applied starting from the cheekbones then up towards the temples.
You can apply highlighter under and above the eyebrows to make your eyebrows look more curved
and to emphasize the eye makeup.
Applying highlighter to the inner corner of the eyes will make your eyes appear more prominent. 
This is especially effective when applied with dark smoky eyeshadow.
Apply highlighter to the edge of the bridge of the nose and tips to make it look narrower and more upturned.
Apply highlighter to the area below the nose and upper lip to make the lips appear fuller.
As a final touch, highlighter can be added to the tip of the chin.
  Vegan. Gluten-Free. Paraben-Free. Dermatologically Tested. Cruelty-Free. Halal Certified.
Always read the label.
Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Aqua, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Propylene Glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, 
Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Propylene Carbonate, 
Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Stearoxymethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane,

Full Description:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Show Your Look Mascara separates the lashes one by one without clumping and gives extra volume to the lashes.

It nourishes and cares for eyelashes with plant extracts in its content

Ophthalmologically tested

Apply mascara with the mascara by brushing from root to tip for more volume

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Show By Pastel Show Your Mascara enhances the beauty in your eyes with its intense, deep black shade.
Volume on the first coat, darker appearance in the second coat and intensify your gaze with the volume effect in the third coat!
Does not smear or clump.
Contains an active ingredient which helps reduce damage to the eyelashes from UV exposure.
Creates a protective layer which moisturises and helps nourish the eyelashes. 
Vegan, gluten-free, dermatologically tested, ophthalmologically tested, cruelty-free and halal certified
HOW TO USE:
You should apply the mascara starting from the roots and up to the tips to bring out the beauty of your eyes.
A fuller look for the eyelashes can be achieved by applying dense mascara to the roots.

DESCRIPTION:
Pastel Express Volume & Length Mascara provides the most intense shade of black to your eyelashes.
Helps to repair and nourish the eyelashes with its special ingredients.
The flexible structure of the silicone based brush is suited to the eye curve which enables it to catch even the shortest and thinnest eyelash and provides a long lasting effect.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Profashion Brow Designer, an eyebrow gel in the form of a tinted cream, helps to easily shape and fill in eyebrows.
Lasts up to 16 hours, stays put, never fades and never smudges. 
Specially designed tube tip is shaped like a palette. This allows you to control the amount of product you want to use.
Slanted brush tip for easy application. 
Size: 7g.
Vegan. Gluten-Free. Paraben-Free. Dermatologically Tested. Waterproof. 16-Hour Long Lasting. Cruelty-Free. Halal Certified.
Always read the label: Ingredients may be subject to change without prior notice. We advise all our customers to check the product label for the most up-to-date ingredients list.
HOW TO USE:
Squeeze the desired amount of product so it sits on the tip of the tube.
Collect with the brush and apply from the inner corner of the eyebrow out towards the edges to determine the eyebrow outline.
Fill in using more product.
The narrow edge of the brush can be used to add more precise application and finishing touches.
The result will be fuller and distinctly shaped eyebrows.
Clean brush after every use and ensure the tube lid is tightly screwed closed.

Working hours: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM Kuwait Time
Customer service 00965 22282990

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
With its slanted tip and 5 different shade options, our Profashion Browmatic Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil adds definition to eyebrows.

Does not contain mineral oil.
Waterproof Browmatic does not require a sharpener thanks to its automatic mechanism.

Mark the outline of the eyebrow with the narrow edge of the tip.
Define the eyebrow by filling in using the wider side of the slanted tip.
Finish off by touching up with the narrow edge.
The result is a natural but distinct look.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Nails that break easily and have white lines on them lack calcium.
Pastel Nail Care Gel makes up for this deficiency of calcium with its special formula.
It is an ideal product for healthy and beautiful looking nails.
Vitamin B5 and calcium salts in its formula allows nails to grow and gain resistance without breaking. 13ml.
Vegan. Dermatologically Tested. Cruelty-Free. Halal Certified.
HOW TO USE:
As a brightener; Two coats directly on clean and dry nails (no nail polish).
As a base; Apply a single coat, wait for it to dry and then apply nail polish.
As a finisher; Apply a single coat on top of dry nail polish.
Will increase the resistance of the nails and keeps the nail polish looking brighter for longer.

Product Name: Brushworks Rose Quartz roller Gua Sha
Full Description:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
This Rose Quartz Massage Set Is A Must Have Addition To Your Skin Care Routine.
Designed To Soothe And Cool The Eye Area Whilst Helping To Reduce Puffiness, Eye Bags And Assist Absorption Of Eye Cream Or Serum Into The Skin
Ideal For Improving Your Skins Elasticity, Promoting Cellular And Skin Rejuvenation.
Known For Easing Tension, Stress And Anxiety.
HOW TO USE:
Cleanse your face and apply serums or oil to the skin
Gently apply pressure and perform upward and outward strokes over the skin, at the end of each stroke lift the roller and start over
Begin with the chin and jawline, starting at the centre and rolling outwards towards the ear lobes
Cheeks should be rolled from the nose straight across the cheek bones towards the top of the ear
Use the smaller end for the under-eye area, this can be rolled gently outwards towards the temple
For the eyebrow area, gently follow the contour of your brow bone, from the bridge of your nose towards the temples
The forehead should be rolled from the middle outwards
Repeat the same motion 4-5 times in each area

The Pink Clay Konjac is best suited for people with sensitive skin; the pink clay is a mix of red and white clay and is recommended for tired, sensitive and dehydrated skin. 
Perfect for overly sun-exposed skin, the Pink Clay Konjac will help maintain the skins elasticity.
This Konjac also helps to absorb dirt, oil and bacteria whilst gently cleansing the pores.
PETA Approved - Cruelty-Free & Vegan
HOW TO USE:
Use the sponge to gently massage face in circular motions, until skin is clean and makeup removed
Rub the sponge over damp skin after cleansing to pick up excess skin cells
Rinse out sponge and hang it up to air-dry overnight

DESCRIPTION:
Revlon Photoready Candid Concealer Banana
This concealer with medium coverage camouflages dark circles and puff, with a jolt of caffeine to help wake up tired skin
It's also excellent at disguising blemishes and other things you'd rather not see

Feels better without: oils, parabens, phthalates, synthetic dyes, or harsh fragrances—making it ideal for delicate undereye skin and a great concealer for sensitive skin!
DIRECTIONS:
Using the plush applicator, dot our concealer directly onto undereye areas in need of coverage and blend with your fingers or a sponge
Most darkness and puff lurk near the inner eyes, so start there and work outward (don't sweep it all over initially; you'll get too much product)
For blemishes, dab a tiny bit on top, then feather out the edges

DESCRIPTION:
5-in-1 multitasking concealer: Erases, perfects, brightens, hydrates and refreshes skin
Transfer-resistant, buildable natural coverage
Caffeine & Vitamin C infused
Hides imperfections + dark circles
Camouflages puffiness, brightens skin
Ultra-lightweight, comfortable feel
Mess-free, antibacterial sponge tip

HOW TO USE:
Using the mess-free, antibacterial sponge tip applicator, dab on the multitasking, long-wearing concealer

Blending out lightly with your ring finger (avoid using your pointer, because it’s easy to apply too much pressure and will smear the concealer)
Apply in a gentle patting motion
Build until you have desired coverage
Now, move on to any imperfections and dark spots, and just dot and gently blend

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Mutli-tasking liquid concealer covers blemishes, dark circles and uneven skin tone
Easy-to-blend formula glides onto skin, delivering a smooth, natural-looking finish
Long-wearing, touch-proof formula that feels ultra-lightweight and comfortable on skin all day
HOW TO USE:
Step 1: Once you have applied any skin primers, bases and under-eye moisturisers to your freshly cleaned face, begin by applying the concealer.
Step 2: Using a light hand, gently apply several dots of concealer under the eyes close to your lashes, making sure to dot the inside corners.
Step 3: With a concealer brush or your fingers, gently dab the concealer to blend it in. You can also apply the concealer to other areas, such as the chin, nose and mouth, if required.

Long-wearing, touch-proof formula that feels ultra-lightweight and comfortable on skin all day
DIRECTIONS:
Step 1: Once you have applied any skin primers, bases and under-eye moisturisers to your freshly cleaned face, begin by applying the concealer.
Step 2: Using a light hand, gently apply several dots of concealer under the eyes close to your lashes, making sure to dot the inside corners.
Step 3: With a concealer brush or your fingers, gently dab the concealer to blend it in. You can also apply the concealer to other areas, such as the chin, nose and mouth, if required.

Description:
Set Contains:
1. Relaxing Lavender Pillow Mist - 100ml
Enjoy a peaceful and restful sleep with the pillow freshener!
A few sprays of Lavender Mist is all you need to help you relax and drift into a deep sleep. The calming fragrance of lavender is known to reduce stress levels and help you sleep better. Thus, this pillow freshener is perfect for those who have trouble sleeping or just want to improve their sleep quality.

2. Shower Head
Ergonomic and hygienic shower head that gives a flow of water suitable for showering.

Features:
- Short and Lightweight
- Inside the changing head, an 8-wing water bowl rotates to create a smooth, structured flow
- When used with a filter, it is good for better mixing of vitamins, moisturizing ingredients and aromas into the water
- Unlike traditional shower heads, Shift Head is designed so that water does not collect inside the head, and can always keep it clean
- Size: Total Length: 10.6cm / Width: 3.8cm

How to Use:
- Please remove the old hammer head from the hose
- Attach the Shift Essence Filter Head to the Shift Head and rotate to connect

3. Vitamins Shower Filter - Lavender
Shower filter with Korean essence that purifies the water by filtering out rust, heavy metals and impurities. With the essence you will enjoy a new experience every month.

How to Use:
- Unscrew the shower head and attach the essence to the shower head and arm

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Face Shield Glass which covers your eyes, nose & mouth, the main pathways through which virus enters your body, without hiding your face.
Suitable for everyday use. It works as a wind deflector and protects you from splashes and droplets.
Hence, It is just perfect protection during your day-to-day errands such as traveling, jogging, riding, working out, interacting with people while at work and outside.
Made of premium polycarbonate, these face shields are extremely smooth and clear, Light in weight, and impact resistant. 
The anti-fog coating in this face shield provides crystal clear transparent vision with superior optics allowing for maximum visibility without fogging up even on differences in climate condition by allowing optimal air-flow. This face shield is hard coated for scratch resistance.
The face shield is washable and reusable. Simply wash it under running water with the hand wash liquid after every use and dry it with a micro-fiber cloth. Made of impact-resistant polycarbonate, this material is used for making high-quality optical lenses. Therefore, this face shield is highly durable and can be used for several years.

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
The excellent DR. Beauti max strip lash glue dries in just 30 seconds.
Attach your eyelashes in a safe, durable, and long-lasting.
Blends with lashes when it dries and keeps lashes securely in place.
It is hypoallergenic.
HOW TO USE:
Apply glue to the eyelash using a tweezer, hold the lashes, and dab a thin line of glue to the lash band with a cotton swab.
Wait for the glue to dry.
Adhere the strip to your lash line and press it into place.
To remove: Use any eye makeup remover, or wet the lashes and they will just slide off, without ripping out any of your own lashes.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
For light/medium skin tones 
Covers what you want to hide, blends seamlessly into what you don’t.
This full cover camouflage foundation creates maximum coverage with an even, natural-looking finish.
Waterproof, non-transferable and long-wearing.
Set with powder for an even longer-lasting finish.
Ideal for all skin types.
Enriched with protective and antiaging extracts of pomegranate and Centella Asiatica sterols.
HOW TO USE:
Firstly preparation; Cleanse your face as usual, apply facial care that suits your skin type, and leave it well absorbed.
Secondly choice of color; Choose a cream Camouflage in your skin tone or mix various nuances on the back of your hand just before use to achieve the perfect shade for an application.
Thirdly apply; Apply the Foundation on the face and apply the liquid make-up with an oval brush.
For a large-scale application (forehead, cheeks, etc.) apply some Liquid Camouflage on the back of the hand, take a small amount with the Large Oval Brush Premium Quality and work it on the face. For a seamless transition to the facial skin, veneer the foundation carefully around the edges.
Tip: If you want to apply the foundation to smaller surfaces, it is best to use the Small Oval Brush.

DESCRIPTION:
Murine® Contacts Refresh & Clean Eye Drop are refreshing and lubricating drops with the added benefit of helping to improve lens comfort by gently re-wetting and cleaning lenses.
It is suitable for all contact lens wearers and may also be used to relieve dry eyes while wearing lenses.
The special eye drop formulation removes protein and fat deposits and atmospheric particles that can build up on your lenses during the day causing irritation and fogginess.
HOW TO USE:
Gently squeeze one or two drops of Murine® Contacts Refresh & Clean Eye Drop into each eye as needed.
Be careful not to touch the eye dropper tip to the surface of the eye to avoid contamination or transmission.

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Murine Dry & Tired Eye Drops help to soothe and moisturize the feeling of dry, gritty, strained, or tired eyes caused by factors such as increased screen time/computer use, wind, and cold weather amongst others.
Murine Dry & Tired Eye Drops are both long-lasting and fast-acting offering up to 8 hours of soothing comfort per dose.
The drops are a liquid gel that contains two lubricants that help lock in moisture in your eyes to keep them feeling their best
HOW TO USE:
Tilt head back and gently squeeze 1 or 2 drops into each eye from Murine eye drops as needed.
Do not apply Murine eye drops whilst wearing contact lenses (contacts can be inserted about 15 minutes after applying drops).
Discard after first opening: 28 days.

Suitable for use on the face, under eyes and body, our dual-ended roller allows you to massage in skincare products to seal in and accelerate their benefits
Treat yourself at home for the ultimate spa experience!

"Specifications
Okashi Galea Hot Steamer - Ionic Facial Steamer for Home Use.. Personal Humidifier Humidifier Beauty Skin Care (Rose Gold 110V/120V)
The Okashi Gliya Facial Steamer uses extremely fine, nano-sized particles that penetrate the skin and effectively replenish moisture. It also has a PTC feature that heats advanced ceramic to vaporize distilled water and produce visibly powerful steam instantly.
Nano steam combined with ionic water molecules is 10 times more effective in penetrating the skin. So just enjoy the ionic facial steamer at home!
How to use OKACHI facial steamer?
*Step 1: Measure pure water on the water tank, please do not add above the scale line (80ml). Insert and press to turn on the water.
*Step 2: Press the built-in switch, it will start working, it will start about 35 seconds, press the switch again to turn off the steamer. (The LED indicator light will flash when the electronic device is in standby mode.)
*Step 3: Steam your face using a steamer, directing the steam at your face (at least 20cm away from the nozzle)
*Step 4: After the steaming process is finished, please turn off the steamer and connect the power.
Please note: Do not put the device in water, and then wash it only.

DESCRIPTION:
The EcoTools Shimmer + Shine Deluxe Set includes 5 makeup brushes and our Fresh Perfecting Makeup Sponge to help you get a sculpted, dewy glow.
This makeup brush kit includes the Controlled Setting Brush, Angled Crease Brush, Spoolie Brush, Flat Eyeliner Brush, Complexion Buffer Brush, Fresh Perfecting Sponge, and Sponge Case.
These 5 makeup brushes and makeup blending sponge help you achieve any look you desire- whether it’s bold or minimal!
The makeup brush set also comes with a makeup sponge case making it perfect for travel.
Our makeup sponge has a unique 3-edge design. The flat surface applies product, the round base blends, and the wedge-like tip helps guide for precise lines.
This limited-edition EcoTools makeup brush and sponge set is the perfect gift for the makeup-lover in your life.
The Shimmer + Shine Set brushes are made with soft synthetic bristles for a natural finish and are easy to clean using our EcoTools Makeup Brush + Sponge Shampoo.
They are also made with renewable bamboo handles and recycled aluminum ferrules.
Our Fresh Perfecting Blender is made from plant-based materials.
As with all EcoTools products, this makeup brush kit is 100% vegan and cruelty-free.

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
The iconic look of the sleek bamboo, gorgeous recycled aluminum and incredibly soft bristles are only part of what makes EcoTools.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
The DEFINE & HIGHLIGHT DUO is designed with 2 brushes to naturally sculpt and illuminate your favorite facial features. 
SCULPT: Use the tapered bristles of the Define brush to dust contour shade onto areas of the face you want to define or minimize such as hollows of cheekbones, jawline, or forehead. Apply by tracing the number “3” on both sides of your face. Start at the top of your forehead; sweep down and across the hollow of your cheeks, then dust across jawline.
HIGHLIGHT: With the wide fanned bristles of the Highlight brush, gently sweep on highlighting powder to facial features you want to bring forward such as the apples of cheeks, center of forehead or bridge of nose.
TIP! Use a contour shade that is 2-3 shades darker than your natural skin tone.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
"RAU Hyaluronic Ampoule" contains highly concentrated hyaluronic acid and can thus bind an enormous amount of moisture and have an immediate lifting effect on the skin.
The use of beetroot and natural corn starch ensures optimal hydration and prevents the skin from drying out. It also has an antioxidant effect and reduces skin irritation.
Panthenol has a calming, anti-inflammatory, moisturizing effect and activates the cell regeneration.  
This special complex of active ingredients improves the elasticity of the skin and strengthens its barrier function.
Wrinkles and lines are reduced in depth, the complexion becomes firmer and firmer.
No oils, or silicone oils; Paraben Free & pegs
HOW TO USE:
Apply to the cleansed skin and tap it in  with the palms of your hands. Then you apply your usual care.
We recommend placing a tissue around the ampoule neck to open the ampoule, so that the ampoule can be bent over on the white ring with a jerky movement. Then pour the concentrate into the palms of your hands to spread it over your face, neck and décolleté.

Instant face-lifting: The face-lifting headband is designed to instantly lift the sagging skin around the face, effectively lift and tighten the face, thin the chin and face, and create a V-shaped face.
Invisible lifting tape: Our product has 3 color options, which can perfectly adapt to the hair color, and the same color and hair color can make it look perfect and invisible. At the same time, it is more powerful and the face-lifting effect is more obvious.
Suitable for any occasion: It can be used for weddings, work, parties, styling, taking pictures, etc., easy to use and easy to carry. The face-lifting effect lasts all day.
HOW TO USE:
Within a few seconds, you can attach the clip to your perfect hair area and then go out.
Just clip one end of the hair band to a place on the skin, then pull the skin back 3 to 4 inches, and then push it down firmly.
This helps you hide wrinkles instantly.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
The Soft Cold/Hot Face Mask is suitable for both cold and hot therapy.
It is versatile and provides a safe and relaxing treatment, for health and beauty applications.
It remains soft after freezing.
It is a convenient way to enjoy a relaxing therapeutic facial at home.
HOW TO USE:
Cold Therapy:
Place the pack in a freezer for at least 10-15 minutes before each use.
Hot Therapy:
Hot Water-Place the pack in hot water (max 80°C) for 10-15 minutes.
Place the pack in a microwave oven (recommended 800W).
Ensure that the gel is evenly distributed in the pack.
Heat the pack for 25 seconds at a low power setting. Heating times will vary with the power of the microwave.
If more heat is required, heat in additional 5-second increments until the desired temperature is reached.
Allow the pack to rest at least 1 minute before application.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
The Real Techniques Starlite Nights Brush + Sponge Set includes 5 makeup tools to help you get a dewy glow that shines bright and cheekbones
as high as the night sky. This makeup brush and sponge set includes our viral 242 Brightening Concealer Brush, 404 Fan Brush,
2 Miracle Complexion Sponges, and Miracle Powder Sponge. This 5-piece set can be used with liquid, cream, and powder products to cover
and highlight for a natural glow. Our #1 MCS offers light to medium coverage for a dewy glow while the #1 MPS helps set your makeup
for a soft, blurred finish. These makeup sponges have RT's unique 3-point application technique that makes blending products seamless.
First use the flat edge to pack on product, then the precision tip to conceal, and finally, blend it all out with the rounded side.
Use it damp for extra dewiness and let that inner glow shine through. This limited-edition RT brush and sponge set is the perfect gift for
the makeup-lover in your life. The Starlite Nights Brush and Sponge Set is easy to clean using our Real Techniques Brush + Sponge Cleansing Gel.
It’s also 100% cruelty-free, vegan, and designed with revolutionary latex-free foam technology.

Place 1 or 2 drops in the affected eye as needed.
Blink several times to wash the eye.
Use the eye drops as often as necessary.
If you wear contact lenses, there is no need to remove them before using the eye drops.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Technology utilises a salon styling technique that delivers full, bouncy volume & curl to create the most body-full, natural looking lashes ever.
Unique crisscross pattern blends seamlessly with your natural lashes
Reusable
Cruelty Free, vegan, contact lens friendly
Easy to apply, comfortable, amazingly natural look
HOW TO USE:
Lay on top of your natural lash to check fit. If strip extends beyond your lash line, trim from the outer edge by cutting in between knots for your best fit.
Apply KISS Strip Lash Adhesive to the lash band; wait 30 seconds for adhesive to become slightly tacky.
Apply lash along natural lash line, tapping into place. Hold as adhesive fully dries

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
This lash glue/eyeliner makes false eyelash applications absolutely foolproof!
No eyelash adhesive to mess with–Black or Clear Lash GLUEliner glides on along your lashline, ready for your favorite falsies to adhere in a seamless way.
HOW TO USE:
Apply to clean, dry eyelids free of moisture or makeup.
Starting with one eye, apply GlueLiner along your natural lash line, just like regular eyeliner. 
Before the liner has a chance to dry on your eyelid, immediately apply your KISS false lash strip band along the GlueLiner line. Pat to set lash strip in place.
Note: When using Clear GlueLiner, apply your regular eyeliner over this product, not under it.

DESCRIPTION:

HOW TO USE:
Pour 2-3 drops of Haute Couture Individual Lash Adhesive in to the glue pocket on the lash tray
Using tweezers, gently remove a trio knot from tray
Dip the knotted end of the lash into adhesive; do not saturate
Starting from the outer corner place lash on top of natural lashes, with the knot close, but not tocking eyelid.

GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:

They are safe on skin as they are made of medical-use adhesive tape glue which Ophthalmologist tested and Hypoallergenic approved.
HOW TO USE:
Apply the glue towards the edges of the eyelashes. Once you press the lashes on the center, all you have to do is glide and paste the remaining of the lashes on either side.
Once the glue appears to be sticky in consistency, fix them on the eyes. Always allow the glue to dry up. It is important for the sticky consistency to hold the lashes together.
Make sure the lashes are stretched across the length of the eyelid and stuck properly on both ends.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
Biotrue multi-purpose solution helps make wearing contact lenses easy on your eyes. Biotrue is easy on your eyes because it is formulated to work like your eyes.
Cleans, removes protein, disinfects, rinses and stores soft contact lenses including silicone hydrogel contact lenses. Biotrue multi-purpose solution cushions and rehydrates lenses for comfortable wear all day.
Hydrates your contact lenses in the same way that your eyes naturally hydrate – by utilizing hyaluronan (HA), a lubricant found in your eyes.
Matches the pH of healthy tears and enables optimal performance of the dual disinfectants.
Keeps proteins in their native state active as they are naturally in your eye. They act as your eye’s inborn germ-fighters.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
A waterproof adhesive for use only with individual lashes
Long-lasting, easy to use with a quick-dry formula, it can keep individual lashes in place for weeks.
It is a latex based adhesive meant to be temporary and can be removed quite easily.
This formula is fully waterproof and ensures that your individual lashes remain securely and comfortably attached, day after day, for up to two weeks!
HOW TO USE:
Before using Ardell LashTite Dark Adhesive, you must perform a patch test to ensure no adverse reaction.
After that, thoroughly clean your natural eyelashes and eyelids so they are makeup and oil free.
Start by applying 2 to 3 drops of the adhesive onto a small piece of foil.
Then, gently remove one lash from the tray using an applicator and dip its base into the adhesive.
Finally, place it over your natural lash, close to the lash line without touching the eyelid. Apply more lashes for desired look.
Allow your lashes to air dry and avoid using oil-based makeup remover.

GENERAL DESCRIPTION
GENERAL INFO:
DESCRIPTION:
ReNu MultiPlus from Bausch & Lomb is a multi-purpose solution for the complete care of all types of soft contact lenses.
This versatile solution rinses, disinfects and moisturises lenses, and removes proteins and lipids contained in tears.
It includes pH balancing boric acid and poloxamine, which removes the outer remnants of cellular tissues.
HOW TO USE:
Can be used daily to clean your lenses, store them in a contact lens case when not being worn, or disinfect and rinse lenses.
